label: SearchIndexerLimits
description: Represents the limits that can be applied to an indexer.

fields.label: Max Document Content Characters To Extract
fields.tooltip: The maximum number of characters that will be extracted from a document picked up for indexing.

fields.label: Max Document Extraction Size
fields.tooltip: The maximum size of a document, in bytes, which will be considered valid for indexing.

fields.label: Max Run Time
fields.tooltip: The maximum duration that the indexer is permitted to run for one execution (ISO 8601 duration).
